DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the pharmacokinetic profile of digoxin when administered alone and when administered with repeated dose of lurasidone 120mg.
DOC.brief_title: Digoxin Drug-Drug Interaction With Lurasidone HCl
DOC.criteria: Male and female 18 to 65 years of age BMI >= 19.5 and <= 37 kg/m2 No clinically relevant abnormal laboratory values History or presence of renal or hepatic insufficiency Participated in a clinical trial in the past 30 days Use of con meds that prolong the QT/QTc taken within 28 days prior to study drug administration
